Importowanie potrzebnych pakietów:
```{r}
library(readr)
```

Importowanie zbioru danych:
```{r}
winequality_test <- read_delim("winequality_test.csv", delim = ";", escape_double = FALSE, locale = locale(decimal_mark = ","), trim_ws = TRUE, show_col_types = FALSE)
```


Przedstawienie 10 rekordow z góry zbioru:

```{r}
head(winequality_test)
```
